text:
Mother's Day is right around the corner and you probably know a mama who needs to be spoiled. From your own mother to your best friend on her first Mother's Day, it can be hard to find the right gifts to celebrate those oh-so-special women in your life.

If you (or your loved ones) haven't picked up something yet, don't worry! Amazon still has so many items available and you can even score them with two-day shipping with Prime.

3. For the mama who is rushed in the morning: Dyson Hair Dryer, $399.99 Expensive? Yes. Worth every penny? Absolutely. Cut down styling time drastically. BUY

4. For the new mama: Initial Necklace, $33.70 Celebrate a new addition with their initial. BUY

5. For the proud mama: Comfy Tee Shirt, $24.99 Mom life is the best life—enough said! BUY

7. For the mama who loves to cook: Recipe Box, $34.00 Add a personal touch by including family member's favorite recipes inside. BUY

8. For the mama who loves to lounge: Plush Spa Robe, $48.00 Because every mama needs something to relax in. BUY

9. For the curious mama: 23andMe Ancestry DNA Test, $99.00 Learn more about ancestry, health and wellness, and even traits, like what your most frequent wake-up time is. BUY

10. For the mama who loves a good podcast: Oprah's 'The Wisdom of Sundays', $14.72 Oprah's words are good for the soul. BUY

11. For the mama who needs more sleep: Nespresso Machine + Frother, $149.99 Waking up early isn't fun, but indulging in a fancy drink to start the day is. BUY

12. For the mama always on the go: Reversible Tote Bag, $32.95 No one totes around more than a mama on the go. BUY

13. For the tech-savvy mama: Echo Dot, $49.99 Create grocery lists, set reminders, and play music. BUY

14. For the skincare-obsessed mama: TULA Discovery Kit, $197.00 Treat mama's skin to a little extra TLC. BUY

15. For the mama who needs some quiet time: Bamboo Bath Caddy, $29.95 Even better? Include a coupon to take the kids away for a few hours so mama can enjoy. BUY

16. For the mama who's never without coffee: Cheeky Mug, $11.99 Sip caffeine in style. BUY

17. For the Instagram mama: Felt Board, $11.99 Celebrate baby's milestones or leave inspirational messages. BUY

18. For the mama who stays up way past her bedtime: Kindle Paperwhite, $129.00 We love that this has a glare-free display and is waterproof. BUY

20. For the mama who has everything: NEST Diffuser, $44.00 No one will notice the house is messy when it smells this good. BUY
